item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Laura Pausini - Exclusive tracks #LAURA30 live performances
item.description:
Hello,

Among the various activities aimed at celebrating the first 30 years of Laura Pausini's career, the first initiative, which followed the live marathon concert held on February 27th, 2023, was the exclusive release of all of her studio albums for the first time on vinyl, in limited and numbered editions.

All the LPs came with access to 2 exclusive streaming tracks, taken from the #LAURA30 live performances of last February in New York, Madrid and Milan, via a dedicated QR code provided with each release.

Does anyone has them?


"Benvenuto (live Italian/Spanish)" and "Non Ho Mai Smesso" (live Italian/Spanish) from Inedito [Clear Vinyl] [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]

"Lato Destro Del Cuore" (live Italian/Spanish) and "Simili" (live Italian/Spanish) from Simili [Clear Vinyl] (Grn) [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]

"Non Ã¨ Detto" (live Italian/Spanish) and "Frasi a MetÃ " (live Italian/Spanish) from Fatti Sentire [Colored Vinyl] [Limited Edition]

"Resta in Ascolto (live Italian/Spanish)" and "Vivimi (live Italian/Spanish)" from Resta In Ascolto [Clear Vinyl] [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]

"Io Canto (live Italian/Spanish/French)" and "Io SÃ¬ (Seen)/ Yo Si (Seen)/Moi si (Seen)/Seen (Io SÃ¬)(live Italian/ Spanish/French/English)" from Io Canto [Colored Vinyl] (Grn) [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]

"Primavera in Anticipo (live Italian/Spanish)" and "Invece No (live Italian/Spanish)" from Primavera In Anticipo [Clear Vinyl] [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]

2 bonus tracks from La Mia Risposta [Colored Vinyl] [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]

2 bonus tracks from From The Inside [Clear Vinyl] [Limited Edition]

2 bonus tracks from Tra Te E Il Mare [Colored Vinyl] [Limited Edition] [180 Gram]
item.author: rapse
